professional_summary: Dedicated Engineering Manager with extensive experience in mechanical engineering, product design, and manufacturing. Proven expertise in project management, customer interface, and technical leadership with strong background in lighting fixture design and UL compliance.

work_experience.description: Managing manufacturing and engineering team while supporting US manufacturing startup
responsibilities: Managed the manufacturing and engineering team
Supported manufacturing startup through mentoring and training
Provided technical solutions during project quotation process
Liaised with UL Inspector for compliance standards
Created fixture sample kits for sales representatives

work_experience.description: Led design and development of lighting solutions and product concepts
responsibilities: Collaborated with Architects and Lighting Designers
Prepared product concepts and submittal drawings
Evaluated and redesigned products for lean manufacturing
